name: 洪桂彬
objective:
分析化學包含物質組成的分離，確認與測定。定性分析旨在化學確認物質之物種，定量分析則在測定其含量。分離操作步驟在定性與定量分析中通常是必要的.
Analytical chemistry involes separating, identifying, and determining the relative amounts of the components in a sample of matter. Qualitative analysis is concerned with the chemical identify of the species in the sample and quantitative analysis is concerned with to mearsure the relative amounts of the components in a sample.A separation step is usually a necessary part of both a qualitative and a quantitative analysis.
schedule:
The Nature of Analytical Chemistry (0.5 wk)
Calculations Used in Analytical Chemistry (0.5 wk)
Errors in Chemical Analysis (1 wk)
Random Errors in Chemical Analysis (1 wk)
Statistical Data Treatment and Evaluation (1 wk)
Sampling, Standardization and Calibration  (1 wk)
Moisture and Total Solids Analysis  (1 wk)
Ash Analysis (1 wk)
Midterm exam
Fat Analysis  (1 wk)
Protein Analysis (1 wk)
Carbohydrate Analysis (1 wk)
Vitamin Analysis (1 wk)
Fat Characterization (1 wk)
Protein Separation and Characterization Procedures (1 wk)
Determination of (Total) Phenolics and Antioxidant Capacity in Food and Ingredients (2 wk)
Final exam
scorePolicy:

Midterm exam：30%
